text:
Winston Raymond Peters (born 11 April 1945) is a New Zealand politician. He was the Deputy Prime Minister of New Zealand and Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2017 to 2020. He served as Deputy Prime Minister from 1996 to 1998. He serves under a coalition government alongside Jacinda Ardern upon the 2017 election.
Peters led the populist New Zealand First party since 1993. He was a Member of Parliament from 2011 to 2020, having served from 1979 to 1981 and 1984 to 2008.

annotations.surface_form: Deputy Prime Minister of New Zealand
